an6.110:1.5: To give up these three things you should develop three things.
an6.110:1.7: You should develop perceptions of renunciation to give up sensual perceptions, perceptions of good will to give up malicious perceptions, and perceptions of harmlessness to give up cruel perceptions.
an6.110:1.8: These are the three things you should develop to give up those three things.”
